name: ifc-ts
description: ifc-ts is a library that provides developers with an API for specifying information-flow security constraints in effectful code. These constraints are checked statically by TypeScript's type checker. Consequently, if an effectful computation, written using this API, is well-typed, then it is information-flow secure (aka. noninterfering).
author: Willard Rafnsson & Mark Kragerup & Mathias H. Nielsen
